title: Graham Higham
text: Graham Nathaniel Higham (24 January 1928 – 19 December 1988) was an Australian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201948%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Middleweight">men's middleweight</a> event at the <a href="1948%20Summer%20Olympics">1948 Summer Olympics</a>. At the 1948 Summer Olympics, he lost in his opening fight, to <a href="Johnny%20Wright%20%28boxer%29">Johnny Wright</a> of Great Britain.
